name.ja: ジャイアント・メサイア

text.en: Once per turn, at the start of the Damage Step, if an Insect monster battles: You can target 1 card you control and 1 card your opponent controls; destroy them. You can only use each of the following effects of "Giant Antlion" once per turn. When an opponent's monster declares an attack: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can equip 1 Insect monster from your hand or GY to this card as an Equip Spell that gives it 500 ATK/DEF.
